name: Mask of Mage 2366
metadata:
{"name": "Mask of Mage 2366 1/1", "description": "Deep in the Dark Forest of Agony, a crowd of mages gathered around a strange stone door. Each unsuccessfully trying a mix of brute force and spells to open it.b�(b�(

Eventually, a mage known as Okot came forward. The key dangling around their neck began to shimmer and glow. Before they could even attempt to try the key, a horrid sound erupted. The scraping of stone against stone. Soon, the door was open.

b�(b�(Inside, there lay a dark room made of nothing but slabs of stone. At the center, a pile of ash. A small sparkle amidst the ash caught Okot's eye.b�(b�(

Cautiously, Okot moved closer and signaled with a raised hand for the others to stay back.

b�(b�(Reaching into the ash, they lifted up a scorched silver mask. It bore the markings for the aura & vision of The Grave.

Okot ushered the other mages to come closer. A realization hits anyone looking at it b� this mask clearly belonged to a member of The Council.", "image": "ipfs://bafkreia5lqpi52ty7txhenllgyh3odxdm2woa6pjnifvvcjv2o645u33me?id=1", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeiho34f67nkedmu7ynmy574dptka2jux7pyl6grubaypsnoeqtc2oy?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Mask of Mage 2366"}}
